sentence.Network_en: Rank was contractually obliged to hand him a cheque for $30 million.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据合约，兰克应当交付给他一张3,000万美元的支票。

sentence.Network_en: Where contractually specified, this protection shall extend to include delivery to destination.
sentence.Network_cn: 如合约中有所规定, 此项产品保护应延伸包括交货至目的地在内.

sentence.Network_en: In addition, a substantial amount of the Merrill bonuses were contractually guaranteed.
sentence.Network_cn: 此外, 美林奖金中有相当一部分是合约规定的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: they were contractually responsible ., 按照约定 , 他们都有责任.

list.abs: 会计词汇E ... contracting party 订约人；立约人；缔约国 contractual agreement 合约协议 contractual commitment 合约承担.
contractor 承包商contractual obligation 合同义务contractual provision 合同条款
会计财务术语中英文对照 - 豆丁网 ... contracts for services 服务合同 contractual provisions 合同条款 contributions 出资.
英国法上，债与产债的合同权利(contractual right)是加以区分，债是一种财产，可向任何第三人主张，而合同权只能向特定当事人请求它是合同当事人依据合同对要.

entry.tran: 合同规定的;根据合约的
entry.def: A contractual arrangement or relationship involves a legal agreement between people.

example.ex: The company has not fulfilled certain contractual obligations...
example.tran: 该公司没有履行合同规定的某些义务。

example.ex: This will be done by contractual arrangement.
example.tran: 这将根据合约的安排来完成。

auth_sentence.content: But we are contractually obligated to run the buses.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we are contractually obligated to run the buses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we are contractually obligated to run the buses.

auth_sentence.content: For all I know I'm now contractually obliged to give Facebook my first-born child.
auth_sentence.res_content: For all I know I'm now contractually obliged to give Facebook my first-born child.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For all I know I'm now contractually obliged to give Facebook my first-born child.

auth_sentence.content: I owed him, contractually and morally, nothing, Saban said, adding that he paid him out of compassion.
auth_sentence.res_content: I owed him, contractually and morally, nothing, Saban said, adding that he paid him out of compassion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I owed him, contractually and morally, nothing, Saban said, adding that he paid him out of compassion.
